EmailTemplate.name: ENG-Hybrid-Cloud-Nurture.ENG-Hybrid Cloud-Early-02.02-Making-Hybrid-Cloud-A-Real
EmailTemplate.subject: How To Make Hybrid Cloud A Reality
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/making-hybrid-cloud-a-reality-preparing-your-it-organization-part-i?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early02]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Hybrid cloud is here and it's here to stay. Now the big question everyone is asking is, how do I bring this into my organization and turn this idea into a reality. Don't worry, you're not alone in this endeavor, and luckily for you Eric Wright has some tips on where you can get started. In this 2-part blog post Eric will walk you through:
- OPEX vs CAPEX - Architecture concerns - Latency - Data Protection - And more
Making Hybrid Cloud a Reality – Preparing your IT Organization Part I <[[http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/making-hybrid-cloud-a-reality-preparing-your-it-organization-part-i?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early02]]> Making Hybrid Cloud a Reality – Part II – Data Locality <[[http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/making-hybrid-cloud-a-reality-part-ii-data-locality?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early02]]> - The VMTurbo Team
